review: I received my Google Chromecast in the mail and it is fantastic! the versatility of how to plug it in along with extra extensions was very helpful as my TV is mounted on the wall with very little space to add cords. The setup of the Chromecast is very quick and easy with simple step by step instructions right on your screen.  Once set up, streaming has been flawless!  Best investment yet!
author: Lindsay Yourist

review: Too hard to figure out for me....
author: JAMES W MCCLUNG

review: Works great very easy to use fast delivery no bugs as of yet thank u
author: JOEL LOPEZ

review: I love my chromecast. I use it daily.  My children use it.  I'm sorry I only ordered one because I have two TVs in the household. My daughter doesn't like to share.
author: Victoria Wray

review: Its a cool device. Although you need certain software/apps to use it... its good
author: Archie Hewett

review: Love these things.. have one on every TV!!!!
author: JimmyJam

review: Shipped on time and connected fine.  I only wish there were more apps that could be streamed.
author: Steven Hampton
